title: Pixel 3 app fail to open and unable to type in Google Assistant
content:
Phone is updated, all apps are updated.

My pixel 3 start having the following issue:
1. Unable to type in Google Assistant, it just jump right back to home screen
2. Some apps are not opening, example: Yahoo Fantasy, GMail
3. When I tried to change the wallpaper it jump right back to home screen

What I tried but still the same outcome:
1. Boot to safe mode, try typing in Google Assistant first thing
2. Clean cache and data in multiple Google App (mainly the ones related to personalization)
